name: MaxelPay
author: mndpsingh287

sections.description:
MaxelPay plugin enables WordPress WooCommerce stores to effortlessly accept cryptocurrency as a payment method.
MaxelPay is a secure crypto payment gateway for both businesses and individuals, supporting stablecoins, utility tokens, and wrapped tokens. It helps you process crypto payments quickly and smoothly. Blockchain technology is the backbone of MaxelPay. It’s the top choice for both new and experienced users as a crypto payment gateway, using advanced cryptography and an AML program to verify merchants in real time.

⏩ Use of 3rd Party Services

MaxelPay The MaxelPay plugin utilizes the MaxelPay Payment Gateway API.

  • MaxelPay:- https://maxelpay.com/
    • Signup
    • View MaxelPay API Terms
    • View MaxelPay Privacy Policy

Support

If any problem occurs, please contact us at https://www.maxelpay.com/contact-us/
sections.installation:
1. Install MaxelPay from the WordPress.org repository or by uploading plugin-zip unzipped folder to the /wp-content/plugins directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through Plugins >> Installed Plugin menu in WordPress
  3. After plugin activation, you can find the MaxelPay settings in the Woocommerce Payments Section.
sections.faq:
How does the MaxelPay plugin work?

The MaxelPay plugin helps online Woocommerce stores accept cryptocurrency payments. When you install and activate it on your website, allowing customers to use various cryptocurrencies to pay for their purchases.

How can I set up the MaxelPay plugin on my WordPress website to start accepting cryptocurrency payments?

To set up the MaxelPay plugin on your WordPress website, first install and activate the plugin. After that, configure the plugin settings to your liking, including entering your Payment API key, Payment secret key, and other necessary details.

How to generate an API Key and API Secret?

To generate MaxelPay API key and API Secret, click here.
